title: CBT Nuggets Microsoft Windows Server 2012 R2 70-411
description:
This Server 2012 R2 video training with James Conrad covers the latest version of MicrosoftÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s popular server, including topics such as Windows Deployment Services, network access protection, and Windows Server Update Services. 

Recommended skills:

Related certifications:

Related job functions:

Trainer James Conrad covers the exam objectives for the Microsoft exam 70-411, Administering Windows Server 2012 R2, in this course. 

James addresses a broad scope of topics, including: infrastructure; user and group management; network access and data security; server image deployment; file and print services; network services and access; and group policy infrastructure. 

This course is for IT pros with Server 2012 R2 experience who want to take the next step and become a Server 2012 administrator. The 70-411 is the second of three exams required to get MCSA in Windows Server 2012 R2.
